name: Lottery
author: Data Process

sections.installation:
1.Download the plugin file ‘Lottery’
2.After downloading plugin file upload Lottery.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
3.Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.description: This plugin shows results of lottery in Turkey by getting data from the website link:https://www.thelotter.com/lottery-results/
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

1.Download the plugin file ‘Lottery’
2.After downloading plugin file upload Lottery.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
3.Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
